name: The Wrath of Dracula
description:
Awaken from your slumber, and take revenge on the village that cursed you to sleep!

As Dracula, every move you make costs blood, and the only way to keep going is to feast on the villagers. However, many aren't too excited to see you, and will take up their pitchforks in order to stop your reign!

Slash, Transform, and Bite your way through this grim grid-based RPG!

This game was made in roughly 26 hours. It uses GallantGames' InControl due to having keyboard issues.
